original: intros u k l. split. - intros Hliminf eps. specialize (Hliminf eps). destruct Hliminf as [H1 H2]. split. + intros N. specialize (H1 N). destruct H1 as [n Hn]. exists (n + k)%nat. split. lia. apply Hn. + destruct H2 as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply H2. lia. - intros Hliminf eps. specialize (Hliminf eps). destruct Hliminf as [H1 H2]. split. + intros N. specialize (H1 N). destruct H1 as [n Hn]. exists (n - k)%nat. split. lia. apply Hn. + destruct H2 as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply H2. lia.
